talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Hey, wait! You're a guy, aren't you?
How come you're able to just...walk
around? Why haven't they arrested you?
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>My wife, Perda, must be working hard to
support Aaqlet.

And I'm gonna do all I can to help support
Aaqlet too!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>It'll just have to be from inside this cell.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>What? How long have you been in here?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait, I recognize you. I've seen you
walking around out there.

I don't understand. You're a man, but
they let you just come and go whenever
you like?
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>Now that everyone has gone up
aboveground again, I don't get to
see <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff> all that much...
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I just wanted to see the faces of my wife,
<clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>, and our daughter, <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Butâ€”and I'm only telling you this because you seem
like a trustworthy sort...

I've actually <clr:0000>seen my daughter<clr:ffff> a few times, so on
average, I'm more happy than upset.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Even though they have me in this jail, I do
see her occasionally. However, <clr:0000>I haven't
seen my wife even once<clr:ffff>...
I know she was planning to work at a
<clr:0000>clothing store<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>, but that's
all I've got.
I'm sure my <clr:0000>daughter<clr:ffff> could tell me more,
but I haven't been able to talk to her yet.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Perda... Aaqlet... I know we'll be together
again soon...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>It must be nice to be able to come and go
as you please. Meanwhile, I'm just in
this cell...
It isn't all bad though. I'm able to see
my daughter, <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>, every day! From
a distance, anyway.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>But I haven't seen <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff> at all. It's been
a little tough on the old spirit.

She told me once that she planned to
work at a <clr:0000>clothing store<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>,
but I haven't seen her walking by.
<clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff> probably knows something, if
only I could speak to her. No one likes a
loud, annoying prisoner...
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Still, while I am curious, as long as they're
both happy and healthy, I'm happy too!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>It's a little hard to tell what time of day
it is in here, not being able to see the
outside world...
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I did figure out that <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff> runs by in
one direction in the morning, and she
goes back the other way at night though.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I think the sleeping area is near, so that's
probably why I see <clr:0000>Aaqlet <clr:ffff>walking by
so often.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>But I haven't seen <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff> at all. It's been
a little tough on the old spirit.

She told me once that she planned to
work at a <clr:0000>clothing store<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.

I imagine <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff> knows something, but
I can't talk to her from here...

<sp:3:0:2:0300>Honestly, though, while I am curious, as
long as they're both happy and healthy,
I'm happy too!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>It's no secret that the Gerudo rigidly
enforce their <clr:0000>law that forbids men<clr:ffff> from
entering the town.
So...how come you're able to just walk
around without causing a fuss? I mean...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>I barely crossed the threshold between
town and desert! They threw me in jail
faster than I could say "No, wait! Not jail!"
They didn't give me a chance to explain
anything at all...
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Hmm... Now that most folks have gone
back up to the surface, I don't ever really
see my daughter, <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>, passing by...
I think the sleeping area was nearby
before, so I would often see her coming
and going.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>My wife, <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>, told me once that she was
planning to work at a <clr:0000>clothing store<clr:ffff> in
<clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>, but I haven't seen her...
I imagine <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff> knows where my wife
is, but I haven't been able to even say a
word to her...
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Honestly, though, while I am curious, as
long as they're both happy and healthy,
I'm happy too!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Greeting>It's a little hard to tell what time of day
it is in here, not being able to see the
outside world...
I had figured out that <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff> would
run by in one direction in the morning
and another at night, but now...
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>What? Perda's working at a place called
the Gerudo Secret Club?
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Oh! That's what the clothing store is
called? What an unusual name.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, I'm happy to hear that she's
doing well.

She must be working so hard to support
Aaqlet up there at that shop...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Hmph! That's it! I can do my part by
watching over Aaqlet while she's away!

It'll just have to be from inside this cell.
